name: The Tale of Pizzalbub
description:
The Tale of Pizzalbub is a horror side-scroller. The mighty Lord Pizzalbub is a pizza demon summoned by the shadows of the water filter's past. You see, when one does not change a water filter it opens a realm to the other side. It is up to you to save the town from an apocalypse. Pizzalbub requires you to make the most perfect pizza before he claims this world as his own. Are you up for the challenge?

Controls

  • Movement
    • Arrow Keys
    • A(left)
    • D(right)
    • W(up, only available in home)
    • S(down, only available in home)
  • Attack (not available inside home)
    • X or Enter
  • Jump (not available inside home)
    • Spacebar
  • Pickup Item
    • E
    • Keypad +
  • Pause
    • Esc
    • 0

Credits

  • Sarah Cruse - Programmer, Designer, Writer
  • Robert Cruse - Music, Sound Effects, Writer
